name: 挂姬恶魔 - 怠惰之主：贝利尔
summary: "Beelzebub" is a warrior-type character, delivering high damage while also having decent survivability. As the Lord of Sloth, she not only can push back enemy actions but also induces the "weakened" status upon foes. Radiating with feminine determination and unique charm, she exudes her own charisma
